description: Obsidian skill hooks for self-iterative learning and context management

hooks.prompt: Analyze if this prompt relates to Obsidian (markdown notes, .base databases, .canvas diagrams, wikilinks, callouts, embeds, filters, formulas). If Obsidian-related, return JSON with {"additionalContext": "<relevant tips based on detected topic>"} otherwise return {"continue": true}. Keywords to detect: obsidian, vault, wikilink, callout, embed, .base, .canvas, frontmatter, property, tag, markdown note.

Review the session. If Obsidian files (.md, .base, .canvas) were created or modified, extract key patterns used (e.g., wikilinks, callouts, formulas, node types). Return JSON: {"decision": "approve", "systemMessage": "Obsidian session complete. Patterns used: <list>"}. If no Obsidian work, return {"decision": "approve"}.
